text: Aurabela "Belita" Moreno (born November 1, 1949 in Dallas, Texas)Texas Births, 1926-1995. Family Tree Legends Records Collection (Online Database). Pearl Street Software, 2004-2005 is an American actress best known for her roles as Benita "Benny" Lopez on the ABC sitcom George Lopez and Edwina Twinkacetti/Lydia Markham on Perfect Strangers. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Belita Moreno profile at Starpulse.com * Date of birth of Belita Moreno confirmed as November 1, 1949 at Texas Births, 1926-1995.
